Subject: Email domain added to Allowlists still be blocked by CAP
Description: Email domain added to Allowlists still be blocked by CAP
What_We_Know__c:
11Feb: issues doesn't happen all the time. We generated appended log files and asked the customer to let us know if it re-occurs. 

Issue still persists with 6242 EPP client.
Provided client: https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_agent/Epp09122024/EppClient_v6.2.4.1006.zip
Asked to also turn on Use Stealthy DPI Driver for the test computers.

24: Waiting on customer to confirm resolved.
11Feb: Could not reproduce the issue. Generated appended log files. Will wait to see if issue comes back.

Solution_Comment__c: After adding one more email domain to the allowlist, the issue was resolved.
